name: decawm_off_overwrite
description: With DECAWM disabled, characters at the right margin overwrite the last column instead of wrapping
comment: Disable DECAWM (CSI ? 7 l). Print ABCDEFGHIJKL (12 chars). A-I fill cols 0-8. J goes to col 9 (sets pending_wrap). K and L overwrite col 9 (no wrap). Final: col 9 = L.
